version_description:
- New level: Haunted
- New monster birds
- We heard you, monster birds are now easier to unlock !
- Fixed issues where the player's progress and score would be erased. If you had previously used GameCenter in the game, your progress will be restored!

We hope you like the update. Send us your comments and suggestions for next update !

- New level: Desert
- Added Boosters to help you
- Fixed Haunted leaderboard
- iPad support

We hope you like the update. Send us your comments and suggestions for next update !

- Fixed graphic glitch in Haunted level
- Other bugs fix

We try to make the game better than ever!

- 2 New levels, can you unlock and master the secret level ?
- New skins for all monster birds!
- Achievements

Hope you like this update!

New features :
- You can now check replays of other competitors in the Arena, simply tap a record in the leaderboards.
- You now fight against other player's ghosts in the Arena. If you are playing with Facebook Friends, their ghosts will be used.
- You can now see what country everyone is from in the Arena leaderboards.
- If you tap on your current Arena prize, you can now see how you need to perform to reach higher ranks.
- New achievements.
- New powerful monsters.

Fixes and Enhancements :
- iPads no longer require initial assets download until the Winter world is reached.
- Space Boss now behaves correctly.
- Balanced some levels.

- You can now use the REVIVE feature in boss levels and in the Arena.
- We now award coins on every 100 points you do in the Arena.
- Fixed issues with the haunted world spawning obstacles on top of others.
- Fixed issue where people could lose their progress randomly.

If you have any feedback, please let us know on our Facebook Page!
Thanks for playing!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Bug fixes and improvements
